title: Global Markets Ramp Up The 'Trump Trade' After Assassination Attempt
content: As world financial markets started to reopen after the attempted assassination of Donald Trump, one thing seemed likely: The Trump trade will get even more momentum.
summary: As world financial markets started to reopen after the attempted assassination of Donald Trump, one thing seemed likely: The Trump trade will get even more momentum.

title: Trump Rally Shooting Changes Biden's Plan To Revive Presidential Campaign
content: President Joe Biden had just begun to turn the tables in his reelection bid when the attempt on Donald Trump's life took away his most powerful tool: drawing attention to his opponent's behavior and second-term agenda.
summary: President Joe Biden had just begun to turn the tables in his reelection bid when the attempt on Donald Trump's life took away his most powerful tool: drawing attention to his opponent's behavior and second-term agenda.

title: 1st Photo Of Thomas Matthew Crooks, 20-Year-Old "Loner" Who Shot At Trump
content: Hours after a bullet grazed former US president Donald Trump' ear at a campaign rally in Pennsylvania on Sunday sending shockwaves throughout the country, the FBI identified the assassin as 20-year-old Thomas Matthew Crooks.
summary: Hours after a bullet grazed former US president Donald Trump' ear at a campaign rally in Pennsylvania on Sunday sending shockwaves throughout the country, the FBI identified the assassin as 20-year-old Thomas Matthew Crooks.

title: Trump Reaches Milwaukee For Republican Convention After Assassination Bid
content: Donald Trump arrived on Sunday in Milwaukee, where he will be formally nominated as the Republican presidential candidate later this week after surviving an assassination attempt that aggravated an already bitter U.S. political divide.
summary: Donald Trump arrived on Sunday in Milwaukee, where he will be formally nominated as the Republican presidential candidate later this week after surviving an assassination attempt that aggravated an already bitter U.S. political divide.

title: "Trump Rally Shooting Calls On Us To Take Step Back": Biden In Rare Address
content: US President Joe Biden sent out a message of unity a day after his rival-predecessor Donald Trump survived an assassination attempt, calling on the nation to lower the temperature of hostile politics.
summary: US President Joe Biden sent out a message of unity a day after his rival-predecessor Donald Trump survived an assassination attempt, calling on the nation to lower the temperature of hostile politics.

title: What Melania Trump Said On Assassination Attempt On Husband Donald Trump
content: Former first lady Melania Trump said Sunday that a gunman who opened fire at a Donald Trump rally was a "monster," as she condemned the assassination attempt in which the Republican presidential candidate was injured.
summary: Former first lady Melania Trump said Sunday that a gunman who opened fire at a Donald Trump rally was a "monster," as she condemned the assassination attempt in which the Republican presidential candidate was injured.

title: "Time To Cool It Down": Biden Addresses US After Trump Assassination Bid
content: President Joe Biden sought to calm a divided nation after his rival Donald Trump survived an assassination bid, saying in a rare Oval Office address Sunday it was time to lower the temperature of America's hostile politics.
summary: President Joe Biden sought to calm a divided nation after his rival Donald Trump survived an assassination bid, saying in a rare Oval Office address Sunday it was time to lower the temperature of America's hostile politics.

title: US Secret Service Faces Scrutiny After Trump Assassination Attempt
content: The US Secret Service was under intense scrutiny on Sunday after a gunman managed to evade its agents and open fire on former President Donald Trump at a political rally.
summary: The US Secret Service was under intense scrutiny on Sunday after a gunman managed to evade its agents and open fire on former President Donald Trump at a political rally.

title: Trump Arrives For Republican Convention Day After Assassination Attempt
content: Former US president Donald Trump landed in Milwaukee on Sunday for the Republican National Convention, a little more than 24 hours after he was wounded in a failed assassination attempt, according to his son Eric Trump.
summary: Former US president Donald Trump landed in Milwaukee on Sunday for the Republican National Convention, a little more than 24 hours after he was wounded in a failed assassination attempt, according to his son Eric Trump.

title: Trump Assassination Attempt Being Probed As Domestic Terrorism Act: FBI
content: The gunman who shot at former president Donald Trump during an election rally in Pennsylvania on Saturday appears to have acted alone, according to the FBI, which is investigating it as a potential "domestic terrorism" act.
summary: The gunman who shot at former president Donald Trump during an election rally in Pennsylvania on Saturday appears to have acted alone, according to the FBI, which is investigating it as a potential "domestic terrorism" act.

title: Trump Rally Victim Was A Firefighter, Died Shielding His Family
content: The spectator who died in the shooting that targeted Donald Trump at a Pennsylvania rally has been identified as Corey Comperatore, a 50-year-old firefighter and father of two.
summary: The spectator who died in the shooting that targeted Donald Trump at a Pennsylvania rally has been identified as Corey Comperatore, a 50-year-old firefighter and father of two.

title: 15 Killed In Israeli Strike On School Sheltering Displaced Gazans
content: The civil defence agency in Hamas-run Gaza said Sunday that 15 people were killed in a strike on a school sheltering war displaced where the Israeli military said it had targeted "terrorists".
summary: The civil defence agency in Hamas-run Gaza said Sunday that 15 people were killed in a strike on a school sheltering war displaced where the Israeli military said it had targeted "terrorists".

title: Hamas Says Pulling Out Of Gaza Truce Talks, As Israel Keeps Up Strikes
content: A Hamas official said Sunday that the Palestinian group was withdrawing from Gaza truce talks, as Israeli bombardments hit a school a day after a deadly strike targeting the militant commander Mohammed Deif.
summary: A Hamas official said Sunday that the Palestinian group was withdrawing from Gaza truce talks, as Israeli bombardments hit a school a day after a deadly strike targeting the militant commander Mohammed Deif.

title: Trump Rally Shooter Was "Quiet", "Lonely" And "Bullied" In School: Report
content: A 20-year-old Pennsylvania man, Thomas Matthew Crooks, has been identified as the suspected shooter who tried to assassinate former president Donald Trump at a campaign rally this weekend.
summary: A 20-year-old Pennsylvania man, Thomas Matthew Crooks, has been identified as the suspected shooter who tried to assassinate former president Donald Trump at a campaign rally this weekend.

title: Biden, Trump Call For Unity After Assassination Attempt Stuns US
content: Rivals Joe Biden and Donald Trump urged Americans to show unity Sunday after an assassination attempt on the Republican put the nation on edge in the run-up to the presidential election.
summary: Rivals Joe Biden and Donald Trump urged Americans to show unity Sunday after an assassination attempt on the Republican put the nation on edge in the run-up to the presidential election.

title: "Bullet Flew By His Ear": Man Predicted Trump Rally Shooting 4 Months Ago
content: Donald Trump survived an assassination attempt yesterday evening during a campaign rally in Butler, Pennsylvania.
summary: Donald Trump survived an assassination attempt yesterday evening during a campaign rally in Butler, Pennsylvania.

title: Trump Rally Shooting Victim Identified As 50-Year-Old Man
content: The person who died in a shooting at former US President Donald Trump's rally in Pennsylvania on Saturday was identified as 50-year-old Corey Comperatore, according to his family's posting on Facebook.
summary: The person who died in a shooting at former US President Donald Trump's rally in Pennsylvania on Saturday was identified as 50-year-old Corey Comperatore, according to his family's posting on Facebook.

title: The AR-15: One Of US's Deadliest, Most Popular Guns Used In Trump Attack
content: The attempted assassination of former US president Donald Trump with a semi-automatic rifle illustrates once again how easy it is for shooters in the US to get their hands on inexpensive, easy-to-use, military-style weapons.
summary: The attempted assassination of former US president Donald Trump with a semi-automatic rifle illustrates once again how easy it is for shooters in the US to get their hands on inexpensive, easy-to-use, military-style weapons.

title: "Shooting Makes Me Stronger": Donald Trump Attack T-shirts Go On Sale Online
content: The first batch of the t-shirts went on sale on a popular Chinese e-commerce platform Taobao, owned by Alibaba, within two hours of the attack.
summary: The first batch of the t-shirts went on sale on a popular Chinese e-commerce platform Taobao, owned by Alibaba, within two hours of the attack.

title: Shooter Who Fired At Trump Had Explosives In His Car: Report
content: The gunman who opened fire at a Donald Trump rally had explosives in his car, US media reported Sunday, as investigators probed the attempted assassination of the Republican presidential candidate.
summary: The gunman who opened fire at a Donald Trump rally had explosives in his car, US media reported Sunday, as investigators probed the attempted assassination of the Republican presidential candidate.
